intension: Create an Instagram story post to promote a special steak deal. The post includes a photo of the steak and the text '@yourname', '60% off', and 'buy now' to encourage purchases.
globalcaption: The image features a white plate filled with a delicious meal. The plate contains a variety of vegetables, including several pieces of broccoli, carrots, and cucumbers. There are also two pieces of meat, possibly chicken, placed on the plate. The dish appears to be a healthy and appetizing meal, likely served with a side of sauce or dressing. The presentation of the food on the plate is visually appealing, making it an enticing meal option.
keywords: food, meat, beef, dinner, cuisine, meal, restaurant, grilled, raw, delicious, roasted, slice, special, steak, instagram, story, insta, ig, tb
